title: 95/55/EC: Commission Decision of 28 February 1995 amending for the fifth time Decision 92/571/EEC relating to new transitional measures which are necessary to facilitate the move to the system of veterinary checks provided for in Council Directive 90/675/EEC
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 28 February 1995 amending for the fifth time Decision 92/571/EEC relating to new transitional measures which are necessary to facilitate the move to the system of veterinary checks provided for in Council Directive  90/675/EEC (95/55/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 8 of Decision 92/571/EEC the date '28 February 1995' is replaced by '30 June 1995'.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 February 1995.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 373, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 221, 6. 8. 1992, p. 54.
(3) OJ No L 367, 16. 12. 1992, p. 36.
(4) OJ No L 256, 4. 10. 1994, p. 30.
